item.title: Zelenskyy says he believes Trump is the key to ending the Russia-Ukraine war—but mentioned it was ‘not very pleasant’ Trump spoke to Putin first
item.description: The Ukrainian president says he will only agree to meet in-person with Vladimir Putin after Trump negotiates a plan.

item.title: The Ambani succession plan: Asia’s $90.5 billion dynasty lets three heirs carve their own paths
item.description: Nita Ambani says her three children are choosing the roles they take in Reliance Industries instead of being told by their parents.

item.title: Elon Musk’s DOGE launched its website. It was hacked within days
item.description: “this is a joke of a .gov site”

item.title: World leaders expected clarity on Trump’s peace plan for Ukraine. Instead, JD Vance scolded them on immigration and lectured them about censorship
item.description: “If you’re running in fear of your own voters there’s nothing America can do for you,” the vice president said.

item.title: GameStop CEO Ryan Cohen fuels speculation retailer will invest its $4.6 billion cash pile in Bitcoin
item.description: Reportedly the games retailer is considering whether to invest some of the cash in its war chest to buy BTC coins, which have soared following Trump's...
